title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Next level patient experiences with Amazon Connect powered by Kyndryl (AIM105)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 通过 Kyndryl 支持的 Amazon Connect 提供下一级患者体验 (AIM105)
abstract: As Health systems today are challenged by rising costs, staffing shortages, outdated IT infrastructure, and growing consumer expectations,  improving access and experience for patients and caregivers remains critical. In this session, Kyndryl and AWS will demonstrate how Amazon Connect can help healthcare providers modernize contact centers, streamline workflows, and expand patient access to care. Attendees will gain practical insights into reducing technical debt, lowering care delivery costs, and launching scalable Amazon Connect implementations to drive innovation in healthcare. This presentation is brought to you by Kyndryl, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 当今医疗系统面临成本上升、人员短缺、IT基础设施老化以及消费者期望不断增长的挑战，改善患者和护理人员的访问体验和服务体验仍然至关重要。在本次会议中，Kyndryl和AWS将演示Amazon Connect如何帮助医疗服务提供商实现联络中心现代化、简化工作流程并扩大患者获得医疗服务的渠道。与会者将获得关于减少技术债务、降低医疗服务交付成本以及启动可扩展Amazon Connect实施以推动医疗创新的实用见解。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Kyndryl为您呈现。
